record.description: Signing the contract between the John Crerar Library and the Illinois Institute of Technology in Crerar Librarian's office, 2:30 p.m., Wednesday, June 28, 1961. Standing, left to right: Edward C. Lugelin (chairman, Crerar Library committee on building and ground) and Herman H. Henkle (Crerar Library librarian); seated: seated: John T. Rettaliata (IIT president, Crerar Library first vice-president), and H. P. Sedwick (Crerar Library president).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
